attributes.action: Break the monopoly of ferry companies between IOW and Mainland.
attributes.additional_details: People are frustrated but this cause is gaining momentum to oust Bob Sealy who is not serving his voters. A recent road accident meant people had to be airlifted at £8000 per trip! He is not listening to the voters who want a CHOICE. Both visitors and islanders are forced to take unreliable, extortionately priced ferries. These people are stuck without a voice.
attributes.background: MP Bob Sealy is unfit for his duty and is deliberately blocking any attempts to give both islanders and mainland visitors the opportunity for a fixed road link to and from IOW. Forced to pay unreasonable prices with no other option.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions for someone to lose their job.
